system.description:
You strike faster than your opponent can parry.

Spend 1 Beat to attack an adjacent enemy twice with Bravery. These attacks are not Inflict Violences, and suffer from Combo Breaker as normal. End your Riff right after.

Blade Churns Blood: Spend 2 Beats to Inflict Violence twice instead, suffering only -1d to the second attack. If both attacks inflict at least 2 Hits, you may immediately rush your Speed, ignoring terrain and moving through enemies.

Furious God Beat: Spend 3 Beats to Inflict Violence four times instead, suffering only -1d to every attack after the first, but you become wide open and all your Defenses fall to 1 until the end of your next riff.
system.flavor: All mangangayaw can move their weapons quicker than lightning. Their attacks are unrelenting, the waves against the shore. Mangangayaw believe that letting up even for a second is nothing but wasted time, unless that lull is to cultivate a false sense of advantage.
